title: Microstructural Effect of Extrusion-Blended PLA/BaTiO3 Composite: SEM and XRD Analysis
content: Polymer-ceramic composites are trending due to their exceptional strength-to-weight ratio, making them excellent candidates for various applications [1]. The aim of this study is to explore the microstructural properties that BaTiO3 can exhibit within a matrix of polylactic acid (PLA) undergoing an additive manufacturing process.
